data.message: can someone please contact me and help me. someone on face book whom ive never met or done business with and doesnt even live in my state has written a disgusting, slanderous and deceitful review of my business. it is a total lie. ive tried to report the review but noone has notified me PLEASE HELP  thx

replies.message: Hi Rj. Thanks for reaching out. If you have reported the review, please sit tight while we look into it. We appreciate your patience. Keep in mind you can turn reviews off for your Page. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2yPyTRD. -Brittany
Hi Rj .Can you please help promote my Facebook page
Facebook i understand that i can turn reviews off but i shouldnt have to especially when its a racist or deceitful lie of a review

Need help
Just got 4 one star review from one person within 15 mins.
How can I Flagg it? How can I pursue that?
What's the Facebook customer service number or email...?
